name: Delivery Dispatch!
description:
Delivery Dispatch is a small game where you jump into the role of a delivery guy on a little island. Deliver all packages in the shortest amount of time. Don´t let your customers wait!

Tell your little robot-bird to pick up the camera and show you an overview of the map, jump off your bike and jump around as a phyiscs-ragdoll, to reach otherwise unreachable places.

This game was created during the A Game by its Cover Game Jam 2021 and is based on a famicase created by Viet-Anh Cao: "Delivery!" Famicase

Check out Viet-Anh Cao´s Linktree 

Check out Triality Games on YouTube
